name: Bounce (itch) (gracerabbittegames)
description:
The city is over run with evil robots! 

Collect all the coins to get passage out of the city!  

Grab supplies! Dodge the robots!

Instructions

Top Paddle:<- And ->

Bottom Paddle: "A" And "D"

A hybrid game of Pong, Arkanoid and Space Invaders.

* Music: https://www.bensound.com

Art Work by Grace Rabbitte
